scripts.build:main: mkdir -p build && rollup -i ./lib/main.js -o ./build/main.es2015.js -c && babel --presets es2015 ./build/main.es2015.js | uglifyjs -m --screw-ie8 > ./build/main.min.js && wc -c ./build/main.min.js
scripts.build:sw: mkdir -p build && rollup -i ./lib/sw.js   -o ./build/sw.es2015.js   -c && babel --presets es2015 ./build/sw.es2015.js   | uglifyjs -m --screw-ie8 > ./build/sw.min.js   && wc -c ./build/sw.min.js
scripts.build:js: npm run build:sw && npm run build:main
scripts.watch: ./parallel.sh "nodemon --watch ./lib -e js --exec npm run build:js" "nodemon --watch ./client -e css,html,png,json --exec npm run build:other" "http-server build"
scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run build:other && npm run build:js
